description:
It is essential for leaders to know their personnel. Both Tadataka and Makoto reflect upon the members of Unit 5121.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Kimi ni koso kokoro tokimeku - A Day In The Life -
Mon cœur ne bat que pour toi
You Are the One That Makes My Heart Pound: A Day in the Life
君にこそ心ときめく - A Day In The Life -
너이기에 마음이 두근거려: A Day In The Life
